00046 #define SC_TBL_ID_ATS_0       (1)
00047 #define SC_TBL_ID_APPEND      (SC_TBL_ID_ATS_0 + SC_NUMBER_OF_ATS)
00048 #define SC_TBL_ID_RTS_0       (SC_TBL_ID_APPEND + 1)
00049 #define SC_TBL_ID_RTS_INFO    (SC_TBL_ID_RTS_0 + SC_NUMBER_OF_RTS)
00050 #define SC_TBL_ID_RTP_CTRL    (SC_TBL_ID_RTS_INFO + 1)
00051 #define SC_TBL_ID_ATS_INFO    (SC_TBL_ID_RTP_CTRL + 1)
00052 #define SC_TBL_ID_APP_INFO    (SC_TBL_ID_ATS_INFO + 1)
00053 #define SC_TBL_ID_ATP_CTRL    (SC_TBL_ID_APP_INFO + 1)
00054 #define SC_TBL_ID_ATS_CMD_0   (SC_TBL_ID_ATP_CTRL + 1)

00075 
00076     uint16     AtsUseCtr;           /* How many times it has been used */
00077     uint16     NumberOfCommands;    /* number of commands in the ATS */

00088

00092     uint16     TimeIndexPtr;       /* time index pointer for current cmd */
00093     uint16     SwitchPendFlag;     /* indicates that a buffer switch is waiting */
00094     
00095 } SC_AtpControlBlock_t;

00105

00107     uint16              RtsNumber;       /* next RTS number */

00114 typedef struct {
00115     
00116     uint8              RtsStatus;       /* status of the RTS */
00117     boolean            DisabledFlag;    /* disabled/enabled flag */

00119     uint8              CmdErrCtr;       /* errs in current RTS */
00120     SC_AbsTimeTag_t    NextCommandTime; /* next command time for RTS */
00121     uint16             NextCommandPtr;  /* where next rts cmd is */
00122     uint16             UseCtr;          /* how many times RTS is run */
